summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Research Agent chat application. All core features working correctly including AI integration, conversation management, and responsive UI.
passed_tests: Send message to AI and receive GPT-4o response
Display chat messages with correct user/assistant roles
Research Canvas displays AI insights correctly
MongoDB persistence for conversations and messages
Delete conversation functionality with toast notifications
Load conversation history when selecting conversations
Chat input textarea with proper validation
Empty states for new conversations and research canvas
Responsive split-screen layout (sidebar, chat, research canvas)
Swiss/academic design aesthetic with proper typography
